summary: This week we added passkey login and management, so you can sign in without a password. Grove can now transcribe voice notes in Lumen and Flow, and the account page has an inline feedback system for reporting bugs. We also cleaned up a bunch of Svelte warnings and fixed our CI.

features: add inline feedback system with spec and workshop entry
improve pre-push with inline errors and parallel checks
add voice transcription to Lumen and Flow (#743)
add passkey management to account page (#741)
unify login pages with LoginGraft across all packages (#744)
fixes: resolve failing CI and Semgrep workflows
docs: add repository snapshot and release summary for v0.9.93
